import { useState } from "react" const api = { key: 'b7dea0749e34131fab7f854992d8b946', base: 'https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/' } export default function App () { const [search, setSearch] = useState('') const [weather, setWeather] = useState({}) const searchPressed = e =>{ if (e.key === 'Enter'){ fetch (`${api.key}weather?q=${search},us&units=imperial&appid=${api.base}`) } } return ( <>
setSearch(e.target.value))} />
